message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $14,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is closer to my limit. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $14,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $14,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
